title: Business Analyst (Vendor Financial Onboarding) at Advantage Technical Resourcing (Charlotte, NC)
text: Source: Dice Title Business Analyst (Vendor Financial Onboarding) Location (Any of the following) Charlotte NC Minneapolis MN Chandler AZ Duration 9-18 months Job Description Vendor Financial Onboarding Acts as a liaison between technology teams, finance supply chain management organizations to consolidate existing and new vendor financials, agreements relationships within the Technology Asset Operations Software team TAO. Must be very comfortable working independently against a schedule in organizing meetings and manage the process of migrating the management ownership of agreements to TAO, while communicating the go-forward responsibilities of technology end-users. All product entitlements end-user charges to be documented and managed in TAO tools. Requirements Experience reviewing contracts to understand financial and software license entitlement implications. Financial management experience - Understand unit costing methodology, budget impacts and transfers, execute internal end-user charges. Communication skills - Strong experience communicating via phone and e-mail with vendors, internal technology teams finance. Software product management experience - Understanding of software licensing metrics, managing entitlements to ensure compliance. Project management experience - Beneficial due to the nature of the position in facilitating discussions, communicating change and tracking status. About Advantage, for applicants US Citizen, Green CardEAD, F1OPT and L2EAD applicants looking for a promising career are encouraged to apply we sponsor H1Bs for OPTs TNs Advantage Technical Resourcing delivers highly skilled engineers and IT specialists for our clientsrsquo most critical technical projects. We provide on-demand contract workers, focused project teams, or permanent hires. With engineering and information technology divisions offering staffing and specialized solutions dedicated to the automotive, marine, manufacturing, energy, healthcare, high technology, financial services, telecommunications, and consumer services industries, we can efficiently staff even the most complex initiative. Each year, we place more than 20,000 technical professionals, serving clients in thirty countries around the globe. Advantage Resourcing offers a competitive compensation package as well as a comprehensive benefits package and 401 (k) plan.
